title: CIMG Inc raises $55M for Bitcoin as crypto firms ramp up crypto stockpiles
summary: CIMG Inc. secures $55 million in share sale for 500 Bitcoin expansion. Strategy and Metaplanet also eyeing more crypto investments.

body.raw:
![ CIMG Inc raises $55M for Bitcoin as crypto firms ramp up crypto stockpiles ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDcvMDE5ODAzOTItZDI5Mi03YTdkLThiMWEtMDRiZGY4ZDkxZjE0.jpg)

CIMG Inc. secures $55 million in share sale for 500 Bitcoin expansion. Strategy and Metaplanet also eyeing more crypto investments.

---

**Original Article:** [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/cimg-inc-bitcoin-purchase-common-stock-strategy-metaplanet?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound)
